works.title: The Struggle for Control: How do Norwegian TV-Celebrities Deal With Critical Media Exposure?
Powerful and Powerless: Psychological Reactions of Norwegian Politicians Exposed in Media Scandals
To be in the critical limelight of the media

rg.name: Kim Edgar Karlsen
rg.affiliation: Diakonhjemmet Hospital Norway, Department of Psychiatry

works.title: The Struggle for Control: How do Norwegian TV-Celebrities Deal With Critical Media Exposure?
abstract: Ten Norwegian TV-hosts, all nation-wide celebrities, were interviewed about their experiences with critical media exposure. How did they perceive their relationship with the press? What were the main sources of stress? How did they cope? All expressed a strong focus on impression management and self-presentation. The majority described an independe...

works.title: Mestring av kritisk medieomtale
abstract:
Sammendrag
Utgangspunktet for denne artikkelen er dybdeintervjuer med 43
personer som gjennom sin yrkesrolle har havnet i medienes kritiske
søkelys. Deltakerne var i utgangspunktet ressurssterke og velfungerende
personer. Under mediestormen opplevde de betydelige belastninger og
reduksjon i livskvalitet. Denne artikkelen fokuserer på deres mestring...

works.title: Å være i medienes kritiske søkelys. Enkeltindividenes erfaringer
